title: Tanner Merritt from O'Brother
itunes:title: Tanner Merritt from O'Brother
description:
Happy new release day! A few weeks back I spoke to Tanner Merritt from O'Brother over the phone about expectations, religion and musical influences for himself. It was a refreshing chat and from a person who I had never spoke to before, it made it even more interesting how honest he was. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
